1.query: SELECT Customers.CustomerName, SUM(Products.Price * OrderDetails.Quantity) AS TotalSpent FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.OrderID = OrderDetails.OrderID JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.ProductID = Products.ProductID GROUP BY Customers.CustomerID, Customers.CustomerName ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 10;
1.title: Top 10 Customers by Total Sales
